Docs.param: The translation to use.
Indicates whether the configuration was specified using a data annotation.

summary.para: Sets a callback that will be invoked to perform custom translation of this function. The callback takes a collection of expressions corresponding to the parameters passed to the function call. The callback should return an expression representing the desired translation.

Docs.returns: The same builder instance if the configuration was applied, otherwise.
